official_title: A bill to permit the transportation, mailing and broadcasting of advertising, information and material concerning lotteries conducted by nonprofit organizations in accordance with state la.

summary.text: Permits the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertisements, information, and materials concerning lotteries conducted by nonprofit organizations in accordance with State law.
